name: @my-lib/motion-core
description: Framework-agnostic animation library for TypeScript and CSS

scripts.build: rm -rf dist dist-cjs && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && cat src/css/base.css src/css/fade.css src/css/scale.css src/css/bounce.css src/css/rotate.css src/css/slide-in.css src/css/slide-out.css src/css/a11y.css > dist/style.css && cp -r src/css dist/css

author: Jules
